author: SteveL-MSFT
body: We have a number of strings that use the Copyright `©` symbol (0x00a9), but due to tools re-encoding files, the symbol gets mistranslated to the wrong unicode value.  We should replace the text representation with the unicode value representation across all files.  (Trademark character (0x2122) might also be used and should be replaced.

title: convert all source and scripts to ascii with LF EOL
